name: Command
description: Command palette for search-based command and option selection with fuzzy filtering

accessibility.screenReader: Root container uses role=search with accessible label. Input announces as a combobox. Items are navigable with arrow keys and announced with their text. Empty state is announced when no results match.

recommendedUsage: Use for command palettes (Cmd+K), search interfaces, or filterable action menus. Group related commands with CommandGroup. Provide keywords for better fuzzy matching.
antiPatterns: Do not use for simple dropdowns - use Select instead. Avoid for navigation-only interfaces where a standard menu would be clearer.
